content: Oh wow. That is EXACTLY what I did when I was 11 too. My parents used to get so upset because I was constantly engaging the phone line (good old dial up!). I learnt my first bits of HTML using funkychickens.com. I remember paint shop pro – my parents definitely weren’t going to shell out for Adobe :) You are literally taking me back 👌😀 Good on you to follow your first passion!
